name: hospitality-platform-frontend
description: Smart Hospitality & Retail Platform - Frontend Monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm --filter guest-app build && pnpm --filter business-dashboard build && pnpm --filter admin-interface build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter guest-app lint && pnpm --filter business-dashboard lint && pnpm --filter admin-interface lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter guest-app type-check && pnpm --filter business-dashboard type-check && pnpm --filter admin-interface type-check
